get.summary: Get elber draws by date range.

parameters.name: fromDate
parameters.description: The from date filter. Must be in 'yyyy-MM-dd' or 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss' format.

parameters.name: toDate
parameters.description: The to date filter. Must be in 'yyyy-MM-dd' or 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss' format.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting order. Options: asc, desc. Default is desc.

get.summary: Get draws for a game by draw id range

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sorting order. Options: asc, desc. Default is desc.

post.description: When a customer places a bet before the bet is placed it its cost is validated.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The place bet request domain object

delete.description: Used by agj to rollback a validate transaction

post.summary: Transforms Elbet's request to Bit8 Place Bet Request

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The place bet request domain object

post.description: When a Sportsbook customer has loaded the betslip with one or more selections and clicks to submit their bets, the Sportsbook front end client sends a placeBets API call to the server. parameters.name: body

delete.summary: Updates the status of a coupon

post.summary: Updates the status of a coupon
Send list of processed tickets from the completed game

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: list of processed tickets from the completed game

data.description: The error data which is an abstract object that may be used to provide any error metadata

source.description: The application at which the API error occured

type.description: The error family, e.g. RUNTIME, VALIDATION, etc

guid.description: The unique identifier of the error process

FaultInfo.description: The FaultInfo object contains all the details assosiated with an API error

betType.description: bet type option depend on the game. e.g Straight, Box, Front-2, â€¦, for Pick-x)

options.description: special options depend on the game, in board level

quickPick.description: quick pick flag for this particular board

ttl.description: The reservation time ( Hours since epoch time)

addOn.description: outcome parameter: the total cost and columns per game type

boards.description: data related to the player prognostic selections

columns.description: the produced number of columns per participated draw

discount.description: amount that has been substracted from the cost when that wager participated in promotion

isPrimary.description: Flag indicating if the game is the primary game (Server side value)

options.description: special options depend on the game, in wager level

participatingDraws.description: data related to the wager participated draws

pilot.description: outcome parameter: flag indicating if the game is in pilot mode

selectionsType.description: Undefined = 0, Simple = 0x01, Complete = 0x02, System = 0x04, Combination = 0x08, QP = 0x10, PartialQP = 0x20

options.description: special options depend on the game, in wager level (for future use)

quickPick.description: quick pick flag for this particular panel

requested.description: this value should be equally to the draw numbers that has configured in the Game Parameters. No validation performed for pick-x game family. For lotto game family, when systemId value is provided, requested must be 0.

selection.description: the player selected numbers. E.g. 1, 5, 8, 30, 35, 45 for a Lotto 6/49

drawOffsets.description: incoming parameter: Advance draw index, specifically you can use "drawOffsets" : [x]  , where x is the offset from the active draw (Advance Draws)

draws.description: outcome parameter: it holds the actual participated draws

firstDraw.description: outcome parameter: it holds the first participated draw

firstDrawTime.description: outcome parameter: it holds the first participated draw date

firstVisualDraw.description: outcome parameter: it holds the first Visual participated draw

lastDraw.description: outcome parameter: it holds the last participated draw

lastDrawTime.description: outcome parameter: it holds the last participated draw date

lastVisualDraw.description: outcome parameter: it holds the last Visual participated draw multipleDraws

multipleDraws.description: incoming parameter: it hold the number of consecutive draws

playedDraw.description: outcome parameter: the active draw at the time the wager was played

specialOptions.description: Draw difference from current draw to special draw. 0 : Participates in the special draw, 1 : needs 1 extra draw to participate in the special draw, 2 : needs 2 extra draws to participate in the special draw

gross.description: Gross amount = Net + Other + Refund + Tax

tax.description: Tax amount calculated using Pay Taxation options

AmountsDTO.description: Monetary amounts broken down by type

detailAmounts.description: Sum of amounts of winnings for the draw

purgeTime.description: Unix epoch timestamp of winnings expiration

winningsPerCategory.description: Array of winnings details per winning category

DetailsDTO.description: Detailed description of winnings for a draw

totalAmounts.description: Sum of amounts of all winnings

highWinner.description: Flag to signal a high winner

LotteryValidationResponseDTO.description: Response for winnings data object for all Lottery games included in wager

SummaryDataDTO.description: Summary counters for each draw status

totalAmounts.description: Sum of amounts of all winnings

startDraw.description: First participating draw of the wager

endDraw.description: Last participating draw of the wager

paidDraws.description: Array of draw numbers already paid

paymentStatus.description: Payment status of the wager winnings

highWinner.description: Flag to signal a high winner

noReceipt.description: Flag to signal a receipt should not be printed

playedDraw.description: Draw number when wager was sold

teamShares.description: Total shares issues for the wager

pilot.description: flag indicating if the game is in pilot mode

taxationLevel.description: Taxation level applied to all draws

saleRetailerId.description: Identifier of the retailer that sold the wager

ValidationResponseDTO.description: Response for the validation or winnings endpoints

WinningsPerCategoryDTO.description: Detailed description of winnings for a winning category

CustomerID.description: Unique identifier of the player on client system

GameID.description: Game ID see section Unique Game ID Codes

TicketStatus.description:
Status of the ticket:
 0 â€“ Open
 1 â€“ Cancelled
 2 â€“ Lost
 3 â€“ Winning
 4 â€“ Paid

PayoutAmountGross.description: Winning amount for which players account should be credited

PayoutAmountNet.description: Winning amount for which players account should be credited

ElbetCoupon.description: Array list of processed tickets from the completed game to CIWS
